data.title: News, Weather, Sports, Breaking News
data.meta_description: Local 12 WKRC-TV is the local station for breaking news, weather forecasts, traffic alerts, community news, Cincinnati Bengals, Reds and FC Cincinnati sports updates, and CBS programming for the Cincinnati , Ohio area, including Avondale, Blue Ash, Bond Hill, Camp Washington, Cheviot, Cleves, Colerain Township, Columbia-Tusculum, Corryville, Norwood, Delhi, East Price Hill, Golf Manor, Hyde Park, Lebanon, Loveland, Lower Price Hill, Madeira, Mariemont, Mount Adams, Mount Airy, Mount Healthy, Mount Lookout, Mount Washington, Oakley, Over-The-Rhine, Reading, Sedamsville, Sharonville, Springdale, St. Bernard, South Cumminsville, Symmes Township, Mason, Hamilton, Union Township, Walnut Hills, West Chester, Wyoming, West Price Hill, Westwood, Winton Hills, Alexandria, Bellevue, Covington, Crescent Springs, Erlanger, Fort Mitchell, Fort Thomas, Fort Wright, Florence, Hebron, Highland Heights, Newport, Southgate, Villa Hills, Walton, Aurora, Greendale, and Lawrenceburg.
data.text:
11 hours ago

Jeff Ruby investing $1M to upgrade Greater Cincinnati staple

Diners at one of the region's most romantic restaurants are starting to notice some changes.

12 hours ago

SWAT teams standoff aboard Cincinnati riverboat as part of training exercise

From tactical teams to dive teams, these men and women were preparing for anything that might happen out on the water.

13 hours ago

Cincinnati nonprofit launches 'Adopt-a-Spot' program to help combat littering

Trash rolls down Cincinnati streets every day, deterring people from visiting the city and causing problems for those who call it home.

14 hours ago

'Be able to get in touch': Some parents worry about new school cell phone policies

The district bought thousands of Yondr pouches for students to lock their phones in during the school day.

14 hours ago

Former employee accused of stealing from Tri-State country club ordered to pay $4 million

The couple accused of stealing more than $800,000 from the Coldstream Country Club in Anderson Township has been ordered to pay $4 million.

16 hours ago

Residents: New sound barrier offers dramatic improvement along Tri-State interstate

It's been a few weeks since the Kentucky Transportation Cabinet (KYTC) installed a transparent sound barrier along I-71/75 in Covington.

16 hours ago

NKY manufacturer awarded $96.5M in trade secrets lawsuit

The international manufacturing company is headquartered in Northern Kentucky, and is one of the world's largest cable providers.
